documents.document: What a solid start to #AFLW. Looking forward to the @GWSGIANTS team debut.
@alissamarie The saddest thing about this is that they are refugees, not 'illegal immigrants'.
It must be said that @brianike was the MVP at the show last night.
@rilez @ChadwickGardner @zachbolen So good huh! A very special night.
.@kingsKmusic tearing up The Metro tonight. https://t.co/HnSVLjuqUU
I've been speaking with @ChadwickGardner and @zachbolen on the phone for years. Today it was in the flesh. https://t.co/aeOt6Hjxwv
Melbourne, enjoy @CITIZENS_SAINTS and @kingsKmusic tonight. If you live there and aren't attending, reconsider.
@angharadyeo True. I keep trying to convince Aimee to let me visit him.
FRESH is back for 2017 tonight. I'm also back hosting. Loads of new music, segments and more. Join me on @Hope1032 from 8pm.
CHANCE AT 18! #Hottest100
Other than on this Kanye track, has @chancetherapper shown up in today's #Hottest100 yet? And why not?
@triplejmornings @triplej @theweeknd Such a tune! So glad I voted for this.
If I wasn't announcing at @Hope1032, I would be at @kinderlingradio in a heartbeat. Great Australian content and our Bub loves it.
Didn't realise Trump's presidency = a 'need to prove it's OK' film release. https://t.co/F5LYoi9mQn
Why? https://t.co/mHX7NyNS6B
@CITIZENS_SAINTS What about the Sweetness of Freedom but I steal the mic and say 'Seattle' just as you're about to say 'freedom'?
A solid year of music. @grettaraymusic topping my #Hottest100 votes in 2016. https://t.co/Yv6lIzVhCm
Managed to work out a way to speak to all of @AMPMovement today. Thanks @samuelock @jameshanmusic https://t.co/BYQSUzkxTw
Just went under the Bold Street bridge on a train. Dozens of people looking over. Remembering those many lives lost 40 years ago. #Granville
@96five Honestly, do it. He loves it. It's been twelve months of re-gifting.
ICYMI: My regular @Hope1032 segment "Win Stuff From Dwayne Jeffries' Desk" is dead. Dwayne relocated to BNE's @96five, desk inaccessible.
TFW you put off buying a compulsory workbook for an intensive unit, then you buy it but exp. delivery is the day after the unit finishes. 😓
'Breaking News' is the new standing ovation. News bulletins flogging it to the point it has no impact. https://t.co/n37rT28qv3
@mattokine The reason why it's no longer a thing: too many surfing dogs.
Been planning some sweet new things for 2017! https://t.co/6k72LFGGBE
This man is a brilliant boss. He gave me a go and allows me much creative freedom. @96five is blessed to have him. https://t.co/V5ImzxhFOJ
@zanrowe Loved this today. And talk on guilty pleasures. Made for a brilliant summer driving soundtrack. 🙌

If anyone is keen to hang out at 4:30am for the next week or so, let me know.
I've done 2 weeks of breakfast radio and suddenly my body has found a routine. Just in time for me to stop.
Pop song released in 2017 that doesn't ride off the success of a 90s R&B sample.

2016: I became a Dad, completed another year of Bible college, and began hosting two new radio shows. Keen to see what 2017 has in store. 🙌
Purposing Rain always was my favourite Prince track. What a classic. #sydnye #SydneyNYE https://t.co/7KzlZH1VVN

Cannot wait for this. Don't miss out on this show. https://t.co/hyGPOE2KTx

Prepping my breakfast show and the news comes in that Carrie Fisher has died. Awful news.

Hosting @Hope1032 Breakfast for a few weeks. Starting strong today by reading out Sydney's worst bonbon jokes. https://t.co/LuwX04fgTF
Last Big Picture of 2016 tonight (Christmas Night!) at 8pm on @Hope1032. I'm sharing my Top 5 Christmas Movies that tell us about Christmas.
@kingsKmusic when we spoke of In This Ocean Pt 1 I said it sounded Justin Timberlake, which you refuted. I hope JT is your response.
The bugs of Olympic Park are in good form tonight. #BBL06
@sebzurcher Dude! You and Saskia set the bar very high last year. And I don't have a cool accent.
@akerr Clever, but not helping. 😔
Really wish that I'd snatched up some Sydney @chancetherapper tickets before they sold out. 😢
@alissamarie Brilliant choices! I heartily agree with having O.J. at the pointy end.

Christmas vomited on @kochie_online and @MarkBeretta. #carolsdomain
Beretts is the Barney Rubble to Kochie's Fred Flintstone. #carolsinthedomain #carolsdomain
Someone sat on the fireworks button WAY too early. #carolsinthedomain

5. Doctor Strange 4. The Jungle Book 3. Hacksaw Ridge 2. Nocturnal Animals 1. Eye in the Sky (2/2)

What a finish, @AlexDyson. Putting my rugs out for you and @mattokine, you dirty crumbs. https://t.co/oCrsYz6tFg

This morning Russ took his review of #DreamWorksTrolls to a new level. https://t.co/IvSzQBJ50u
Can highly recommend taking an hour to watch @TheBearPack's improv special on @abciview. Very funny and very clever. #icecreamghosts
What a treat #CrowdedHouseLive has been. Perfectly put our three week-old to sleep. Thanks @ABCTV.
@zachmander @CollectiveNoun_ Take it to Shark Tank before Dominos claim it. You're sitting on a gold mine here. Children's party revolution.

@kyranwheatley Very sad to see you leaving the airwaves. You're one of the best!
